title: Prawn laksa soup
ingredients: ['150g rice noodles', '2 tablespoons red curry paste, or to taste', '1 red chilli, seeded and diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 stalk lemongrass, diced', 'vegetable oil, as needed', '750ml chicken stock', '750ml coconut milk', 'fish sauce, to taste', 'chilli sauce, to taste', 'sugar, to taste', '150g bamboo shoots, cut into strips', '150g cucumber, seeded and sliced', '400g raw prawns, peeled and halved', '100g beansprouts', 'spring onions, sliced, to garnish', 'fresh coriander and mint leaves, to garnish', 'fried shallots, to garnish']
